title: [CLIENT] when Garen bot uses noble skin, blue rectangle appears instead of splash art
body: When you get garen bot in coop vs ai, if he chooses the garen noble skin, a blue box appears instead of the splash art.

replies.body:
Hey TinyURL! 

Thanks for the report! We'll see why this splash may have gone MIA.
Why reply about something cosmetic that doesn't affect game-play and ignore more debilitating bugs?

Because, KateyKhaos is on the skins team, as such, she can really only be useful if the bug revolves around skins.
There are other rioters who work on other teams, they do not ignore bugs, i'm sure they read as many as they can. 
Responding to a post takes up time, meaning that less of the other bug reports can be read. 
This may be why many of them don't respond to posts, i don't know exactly. Another reason they don't could be, that players will yell at them for replying to one post and not another, then scream that they are being ignored. 
Rioters are still people, and a lot of people don't like being yelled at. 

Now skins, they do not have as many bugs as other features, so katey has less to go through and can spend more time responding to posts. But she has said in the past, they all make sure bugs are known. If she sees a bug report for something that isn't a skin, and the team working on that feature needs to be aware of it, she will let them know its there.

Yup! I only comment in situations where I'm helpful, and since I'm on the skins team, things such as this are more my expertise than some gameplay issues. 

When I see gameplay/champion issues, I do send them off to the appropriate team. :]
Thank you Dellron and Katey for clarifying.
The name of his chroma pack, Garen's is called noble, lucian's is prime, fizz's is scorch etc.
